original_text: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship unto the other side, much people gathered unto him: and he was nigh unto the sea.
korean_text: 예수께서 배를 타시고 다시 맞은편으로 건너가시니 큰 무리가 그에게로 모이거늘 이에 바닷가에 계시더니

sentences.original_text: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 다시 배를 타고 건너가실 때

sentences.original_text: and he was nigh unto the sea
